subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: Danny Lee, the United States Amateur champion, defeated the British Amateur champion Reinier Saxton in the 12th annual Georgia Cup match, staged a week before the Masters Tournament. Lee broke Tiger Woods’s record by six months to become the youngest United States Amateur champion in August at the age of 18. He also won the Johnnie Walker Classic in Australia last month to become the youngest winner of a European Tour event. He sealed the win over Saxton in the 18-hole match with a par on No. 17 at the Golf Club of Georgia. Next week, Lee and Saxton will play in the Masters.
